subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which important historical site in Rajasthan is also known as the 'City of Victory'?
question_hi: राजस्थान में मतिष्टिक स्थान जो 'विकृति कलाकार' कहा जाता है।
explanation_en: Amber Fort, also known as 'Amar Vihar', is a historical site and royal palace located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It is famously known as 'Amar Vihar' and not 'Ambar Vihar'.
explanation_hi: एमबीर किला, फर्मेंट को 'अम्बर विविधि' के अन्याय तथा नामों का विविधि।
